shri lanka krikat eekabaddha pila wenuwen prasadini wirakkodi saha chathurika aananda pithiharambaayenda pi්rayani adhikari saha dilrukshi welarathna pandu yawimenda daskam dakwimata samathwuha.kolts pilaayesha prabodhani, hiruka pranandu, anushka samanmali, udeshika prabodhani, chamani senewirathna, shripali wirakkodi, sandamali dolawaththa, dushanthi dedunu, gayathri kariyawasam, lakmali perera, madhuri samuddhika, sanjiwani wirakkodi, hasini wikramasinha saha dumila dedunu.shri lanka krikat eekabaddha pilalakmali adhikari, anuradha alahapperuma, harshani gallage, ama kanchana, pujani prasadika, jiwani rathnayaka, dilrukshi welarathna, pi්rayani adhikari, chathurika aananda, nipuni hansika, sagarika lakmali, madhushi maduwage, dilhani siriwardhana saha prasadini wirakkodi.kurunagala - meriyans kanthapalamu wataye tharaga 3n ma jayagrahanaya himikara ganimata samathwu kurunagala kandayama wenuwen nayika chamari polgampola, chamari athapaththu saha dilani manodhara pithiharambaayen da chandi wikramasinha pandu yawimenda daskam dakwuha.
